title: Ep60: Banning Oral, MMF, and Domestic Violence Feat Christylezz & Chrissy Monroe
itunes:title: Ep60: Banning Oral, MMF, and Domestic Violence Feat Christylezz & Chrissy Monroe
description:
While Weezy is away in Dallas for work, Mandii is joined in the studio by Love&HipHop's Chrissy Monroe and host of DussePalooza and the Trappin Anonymous Podcast Christylezz. In this episode, the discussion touches on many topics including the President of Uganda wanting to ban oral sex and a MMF Threesome....or is it a train? The group touch on a woman wanting to have sex with two men at once and what it truly means. The episode takes a more serious approach when they discuss domestic violence from all angles. The victim, the abuser, and the friends and family witnessing the abuse. If you have been a victim of domestic abuse and would like to gather more information on how and where to get help, please visit SurvivetoThriveGlobal.org Follow our guests on social media Chris @Christylezz Chrissy Monroe @ChrissyMonroe Tickets are still on sale for the Whoreible Decisions Live Show in Atlanta! Make sure you get your tickets now at whoreibledecisionslive.eventbrite.com Want Bonus content? Become a Patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
